ygData.msgSnippet: Veratis stared at the form before him. It was large and powerful. The best part was that it still wasn t completely finished. Shadow Wing you are truly

Veratis stared at the form before him. It was large and powerful. The best
part was that it still wasn't completely finished. "Shadow Wing you are
truly becoming a beautiful creature. So graceful yet so powerfull." He was
still astonished at what she turned out to be. "Lunarpine still hasn't
returned and I can't communicate with him." He was wondering if her
telepathy was still there or if it had stopped with her completion." Do not
worry my dear, everything will be fine.
----- Original Message -----
From: <logomorph@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Monday, October 30, 2000 6:42 AM
Subject: Re: other three characters


 > Shadow Wing::
>
> She woke up from her stasis lock and grouned. She sat up and looked
> around the lab. Looking down at her arms, she could see the outside
> of the skin changing. It was starting to cover the outside of the
> form. She moved slowly and a bit awkward. She stood up and leaned
> against the table. She looked at Veratis and spoke in a very sratchy
> voice, "where is lunarpine? wil he make it back soon?" SHe tried not
> to focus on the discomfort that came with the changing of her form.
> She took a step forward and stopped. It felt all to strange to be
> walking again.
>
>
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> >
> > Lady Hawk searched the medical files from any past injuries the
> alliance
> > members might have had. she was hoping to simulate the DNA through
> the CR
> > chambers.
> >
> >
> >
> >
> >
> > Phobias babies watched the happenings around KitKats group. they
> watched the
> > conference with Magnus and Gabriel with simulated interest. This
> was the
> > type of agreement Phobia was hoping for. Only through peace talks
> could the
> > temporal anomalies stop. either talks or destruction.
> >
> >
> > Veratis watched as the protoform took the shape of the DNA, then
> change into
> > owl form then a sort of robot form. he hadn't heard her in a while
> so either
> > the body was using to much energy or she'd learn to control it. He
> waited
> > anxiously for her to complete her transformation. He wanted to see
> what
> > other abilities she'd contracted.
>
>
>
>
